name: ghost-s3-storage
description: Store Ghost's media at AWS S3 storage. Modified version of ghost-s3 (https://www.npmjs.org/package/ghost-s3) and ghost-aws-s3 (https://github.com/kimar/ghost-aws-s3)

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p content/storage && mkdir -p content/storage/ghost-s3 && cp node_modules/ghost-s3-storage/index.js content/storage/ghost-s3/

author: Hoang Pham Huu <phamhuuhoang@gmail.com> (http://thucdon24.com/)
